name: Splat the Slime
description:
Meet a Slime named Splat!

One day he decided, that he wants to return back to his home, but this path isn't that easy anymore - it's full of dangerous spikes!  Will you be able to help Splat return back to his home?

• • • • • • • • • • • • •

This game is a Demo to test out Godot 4, if you'll enjoy its mechanics, then we'll make our own textures and release it as a full game with lots of different levels AND its unique story!

Please, make sure to leave your reviews, so we could understand your interests in this type of game!

Controls:

  • A - Move Up
  • D - Move Down
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • S - Restart Level
